CustomField.formula: IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Fast_Track_Request__c))) , Today()- RFP_Receipt_Date__c > 75),"Exceeding TAT", IF(AND((ISPICKVAL(Fast_Track_Request__c, "Standard")) , Today()- RFP_Receipt_Date__c > 30),"Exceeding TAT", IF(AND((ISPICKVAL(Fast_Track_Request__c, "Moderate")) , Today()- RFP_Receipt_Date__c > 45),"Exceeding TAT", IF(AND((ISPICKVAL(Fast_Track_Request__c, "Complex")) , Today()- RFP_Receipt_Date__c > 60),"Exceeding TAT", IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Fast_Track_Request__c)),"ERROR-No Proposal Type Entered", "Within TAT ")))))
CustomField.label: Input On Time
